Galleries Art Fair, Korea‚Äôs very first art fair, was established in 1979 to promote our precious works of art to the public and develop the art market. Based on decades of know-how and experience, Galleries Association of Korea is striving to foster artists by promoting projects to discover new artists, and communicate with the audience through contemporary art exhibitions selected by member galleries. Galleries Art Fair is a representative art fair in Korea that is taking the lead to put continuous effort in cultural development that enriches Art and life of our time.
